original_text: Then the leaders of the priests and our rulers took hold of him. They gave him to the Roman ruler. They said that he had done bad things and that he ought to die. So they killed him by fixing him to a cross.
korean_text: 우리 대제사장들과 관리들이 사형 판결에 넘겨 주어 십자가에 못 박았느니라
